reviewText: As the years roll on, those we have known down through the many years have slipped away home.  This is a great follow up to the first DVD.  It does not seem possible that so many friends, so many Wonderful Gospel voices have been stilled. Thanks to Bill Gather, who captured These greats at the peak of their spiritual and singing journey, and preserved it for all of us to remember and pass on to loved ones who did not get know them.
summary: Another of those who are singing in Heaven
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is one of my favorite videos. I love the way they have all stayed together through the years. Bill Gaither always shows people from the past and he shows his love and respect . He never forgets his old friends. I love all of his dvd's and I hope to own them all.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Bill Gaither is such a lovely man.  He has such a wonderful spirit.  He cares deeply about the singers that sing on his homecoming videos.  This is a beautiful dedication dvd for some of homecoming singers who have gone home to be with the Lord.  I love this dvd and I love the way Bill remembers them with a song in their heart. I would recommend this DVD to anyone who loves good Gospel music and love to hear it done well.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I grew up with these groups.  Knew some of them very well.  My mother has alzheimers and watches this and while she can't remember her own children most of time, she remembers Hovie Lister like it was yesterday.  Makes me happy.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Bill Gaither Remembers Old Friends is a great video.  All seven of the performers have been great favorites of mine and it is great to have a DVD for remembering them.  The video gives a review of their careers, interviews and memorials.I am really glad I bought this DVD.
summary: I love these stars from the past Gaither videos
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is the second Christmas that I've bought the Bill Gaither DVDs for my parents and grandmother.....they love them, each one adds something new.  My grandmother has alzheimers and these dvds help turn her bad days into good ones, thanks Gaithers for all your inspiration and encouragement.  My family has sung your songs all my life!!!
Title: N/A
